name: offline_data_ingestion_node
description: Neon Bindings for acessing the rust built offline_data_ingestion in node

scripts.build: cargo-cp-artifact -nc offline_data_ingestion.node -- cargo build --release --message-format=json-render-diagnostics && cp offline_data_ingestion.node ../../../apps/web/pkg/offline_data_ingestion.node && cp offline_data_ingestion.node ../../../packages/actions/pkg/offline_data_ingestion.node
